content: Compassion meditation, also known as metta meditation, is a practice that involves cultivating a sense of loving-kindness and understanding towards oneself and others. To begin a metta meditation practice, find a comfortable seated position and take a few deep breaths to calm and focus the mind. Then, bring to mind a person or being that you feel a sense of love or connection towards, and silently repeat the following phrases: "May you be happy, may you be healthy, may you be safe, may you live with ease." As you repeat these phrases, try to cultivate a sense of warmth and understanding towards the person or being in your mind. Then, gradually expand your circle of loving-kindness to include others, such as friends, acquaintances, and even those who may be difficult for you to feel kindness towards. Remember, the goal is not to force or manipulate your feelings, but rather to cultivate a sense of openness and understanding towards all beings. May you find peace and understanding through your metta practice.
